allInfo.content: Nestled between the Kundasang roundabout and the renowned Desa Milk Farm, Tisan Nulu beckons with a selection of welcoming rooms and charming bungalows. Indulge in the added convenience of shared kitchen and BBQ facilities. Here, amidst stunning views of Mount Kinabalu from the relaxation deck, you're invited to craft unforgettable moments.

settings.tnc:
Please read carefully.
Number of Persons
  • The term 'Number of Persons' refers to the total number of individuals, including children above 12 years old.
  • Bookings should be made based on the accurate number of persons intending to stay.
House Rules
  • Smoking and pets are not allowed anywhere in the compound.
  • You can cook in the kitchen (bungalow) or sharing kitchen (family block).
  • Please do not make loud noises especially from 10pm-7am.
  • Please respect the check-in-time of 3pm to 6pm, and check-out-time of 9am to 11am.
  • Please observe the designated check-in time of 3pm to 9pm and check-out time of 9am to 11am.
  • You cannot check in after 6pm unless with prior special arrangement.
Cancellation Policy
  • All prepaid bookings are non-refundable and non-transferable.
  • No cancellation will be applied once booking is confirmed.
  • You must provide notice, at least 30 days before actual date for any amendment, and it will be subject to room availability.
  • No show or Non-arrival will result in forfeiture of the payments.
